insertUser: insert into wmt.users (name, email, password) values ($1, $2, $3)
updateUserData: update wmt.users set name = $2 where id = $1
insertUserRegistrations: insert into wmt.user_registrations(confirmation_code, name, email, password) values ($1, $2, $3, $4)
selectUserRegistrations: select * from wmt.user_registrations where email = $1 and confirmation_code = $2
deleteExpiredUserRegistrations: delete from wmt.user_registrations where created_at < now() - interval '1 day'
selectUserPasswordReset: select * from wmt.user_password_reset where email = $1 and confirmation_code = $2
deleteUserPasswordReset: delete from wmt.user_password_reset where email = $1 and confirmation_code = $2
updateUserPassword: update wmt.users set password = $1 where email = $2
deleteExpiredUserPasswordResets: delete from wmt.user_password_reset where created_at < now() - interval '1 day'
